name: Adewale Ayuba
description: '''Adewale Ayuba''' (born 25 March 1965), also known as '''Mr. Johnson''', is a Nigerian [[Fuji music|Fuji]] singer. Ayuba has referred to himself as the "Bonsue Fuji King", and “Bonsue Fuji Maestro”, because he has claimed to be the original artist to coin the term "Bonsue Fuji" as a subgenre of [[Fuji music|Fuji Music]].
